Participants claimed traditional culture is more useful than K-pop to promote the national image. / Courtesy of the Korea Foundation for International Culture Exchange K-pop boy band INFINITE performs in Dubai on Dec. 6, the final leg of its first world tour venturing to 14 countries and 21 cities for 31 live concerts./ Korea Times file  Copyright@KoreaTimes.co.kr All rights reserved
title: 'K-pop does little for economy' - The Korea Times
